segments.text: Hello , it's nice to meet you .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'm glad we're meeting today . Thank you .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I would like to talk to you about your daughter .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Your daughter is a wonderful student .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: She isn't messing up in class ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Of course not . Your daughter is smart and very well behaved .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , I'm so glad to hear that she's doing well .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It is my pleasure to have her in my class .
segments.speaker: S2
